E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 1/31/1983
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Walter Baca
in return for
SS George Opitz.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Wednesday, 2/5/1983
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- I still prefer the offer from Gashouse.
They offer more years.

Regards,
Davy Tremane

Regards,

Lee Roy Oliver
